name: CONTRIBUTION
title: CONTRIBUTION
description: Documents a Contribution (change set) of one or more versions added to a change-controlled repository.

element.short: Documents a Contribution (change set) of one or more versions added to a change-controlled repository.
element.definition: Documents a Contribution (change set) of one or more versions added to a change-controlled repository.

element.short: Set of references to Versions causing changes to this EHR.
element.definition: Set of references to Versions causing changes to this EHR. Each contribution contains a list of versions, which may include paths pointing to any number of versionable items, i.e. items of types such as `COMPOSITION` and `FOLDER`.

element.short: Audit trail corresponding to the committal of this Contribution.
element.definition: Audit trail corresponding to the committal of this Contribution.
